titleStmt.title: An account of the private league betwixt the late King James the Second, and the French king in a letter from a gentleman in London, to a gentleman in the countrey.
titleStmt.author: Allix, Pierre, 1641-1717.
Gentleman in London.

notesStmt.note: Caption title: The private league betwixt the late King James II and the French king.
Written by Pierre Allix. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
